name: Rogue Like Game - Dungeon Gunner
description:
A Dungeon Gunner Game When you play as a Pirate that should kill some Skeletons and blobs, and a Hard Special Boss, The Assets are made by @gamesplusjames and i use his Udemy course to Make the Game, of course i added other mechanics so that the game is not a copy and paste from the original one, This Game is a learning experience, I will continue to improve it with updates to make it more original

the "Special Boss" is just a place holder i will replace it later with a new one, Who's a little easier to beat
